full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Research Grant (2)**
----------

**Official Reference:** WS3676468073-Doc3981295999

**Publication Date:** 26th September 2023

**Amendment**: The closing time of the bid submission has been revised. Please disregard the original closing time specified in the Ariba Discovery posting and CanadaBuys. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 2:00 pm ET on 26th October 2023. 

This announcement cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation number Doc3678096133, dated 6th October 2022, with a closing date of 24th November 2022 at 13:00. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted proposals in the previous solicitation.

**Project Overview**:
Polar Knowledge Canada (POLAR) invites bids for the services of an experienced, well-networked, and highly skilled professional project and program management company. The successful bidder will administer the suite of awards programs, including design, management, andoversight of particular aspects of grant administration, advertising the competition, adjudicating applications through a coordinated multi-stakeholder review committee, and providing recommended lists of awardees to POLAR for consideration and acceptance.

**Bid Details**:

* **Tender Status**: Cancelled
* **Tender Category**: SRV (Services – Research and Related)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Bid Submission Deadline**: 2:00 pm ET on 26th October 2023

**Contact Information**:
Onwuama Ezechinedu, Nkechi (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: None
Fax: None

**Notice and Attachments**: The tender notice is available online at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17505063?extsite=MTc1MDUwNjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. Due to the sensitive nature of the tender, no attachments are provided.

The tender is open to bidders from Canada and countries participating in the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade
